title: Configure Custom User Roles
description: A customer needs several custom user roles configured to match their specific organizational structure and security policies.

tasks.description: Work with the customer to define the exact permissions required for each custom role.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant documents the permission matrix for each new role.

tasks.description: Create the new roles in the product's admin panel and configure the specified permissions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant successfully creates the custom roles.

tasks.description: Assign the new roles to test users and have the customer validate that the permissions are working as expected.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer confirms the roles are configured correctly.
